t: Amazon Brand Registry | Sell on Amazon
s: Enroll your brand in Amazon Brand Registry to unlock tools designed to protect and build your brand, creating a better experience for your Amazon customers.

t: Brand Stores: Create a brand page on Amazon for free | Amazon Ads
s: Brand Stores help build brand awareness by showcasing your brand and product catalog on your own Amazon web address. You can create a Brand Store at no additional cost—with no coding necessary.

t: Amazon is dropping dozens of in-house brands you didn’t even know it owned | The Verge
s: August 10, 2023 - The retail giant plans on cutting ... private-label brands across a variety of departments, most of which operate without Amazon branding, such as Solimo, Wag, and Mama Bear....

t: The Life and Death of the Amazon Brands
s: August 15, 2023 - One way to look at this is as a story of a minor corporate misadventure by a company that tends to try a lot of things at once. Dozens of brands that most customers neither knew nor particularly cared were owned by Amazon have now come and gone with little effect on its vast, churning, and ...

t: Nike to resume selling directly on Amazon for first time since 2019
s: 3 days ago - Nike confirmed to CNBC that its shoes are returning to Amazon.

t: More brands are leaving Amazon, but the strategy could backfire
s: January 27, 2020 - Amazon continues to dominate online shopping. It controls 38% of the e-commerce market in the U.S., far ahead of rivals like eBay and Walmart, which only claim single-digit percentages, according to eMarketer. Brands that attempt to replicate the services they lost by ditching Amazon may find ...

t: Amazon-first gadget brands Aukey and Mpow are suddenly, suspiciously disappearing | The Verge
s: May 10, 2021 - Many Amazon listings for two major electronics sellers, Aukey and Mpow, have mysteriously disappeared as of Monday afternoon. It’s unclear exactly what might be going on.

t: Brand Store has gone missing
s: This message means that an account already exists to create or manage the Amazon Store for this brand at on the Amazon Marketing Services website.

t: Requirements and tips for enrolling a brand in Amazon Brand Registry - Sell on Amazon
s: June 4, 2024 - Brand name discrepancies: Ensure that the brand name you provide during enrollment matches the trademark text exactly. Pay attention to spaces and symbols to prevent discrepancies. For example, if you register your trademark as “Buy with Prime” but your application shows “BuywithPrime,” ...

t: Amazon
s: I am the brand owner of all my ASINs, they are private label products. Featured offer has been removed from all my listings. My account is enrolled in 'Account Health Assurance', I have 0 violations, nothing on performance notifications, voice is customer is clean, feedback is always address etc...

t: Current List of Amazon Gated & Restricted Brands - The Selling Guys
s: January 2, 2025 - Canary went direct to Amazon and Steel Series first sent a nasty letter than 24 hours later I got the IP complaint. Wish I’d been aware of this list before I sent in my Altec’s…my 3rd IP complaint. I’m drastically changing electronics selling and sourcing. Do you know, when an IP complaint is lifted is it truly gone...

t: My brand has been removed by Amazon
s: My brand has been removed by Amazon for nearly three months, during which time I have submitted a POA and passed the brand video review. However, so far Amazon has not restored my brand and deleted a listing under that brand, which has brought great risks and losses to my operations.

t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia
s: November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.

s: Frequently asked questions about returns and replacements of items you have ordered.

t: Sponsored Brands – Increase brand awareness | Amazon Ads
s: Sponsored ads on Amazon help build your brand and drive sales. Invest in long-term business growth by advertising your brand and products on Amazon.

t: Amazon (company) - Wikipedia
s: 4 days ago - Amazon sells many products under its own brand names, including phone chargers, batteries, and diaper wipes. The AmazonBasics brand was introduced in 2009, and now features hundreds of product lines, including smartphone cases, computer mice, batteries, dumbbells, and dog crates.
